subject: Frank Re: Alwas testing.
author: athena97531
full_text:
That's great that you are miniaturizing, Frank, as well as continuing to find new ways to build these.  Athena

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
>
> It's a tiny tuner, and I wanted it on a compact board, but with all
> functions. AM is alittle screwy, and the boost function  would not work with
> a coil added to the antenna, I had to connect the boost amp to one of the
> antenna inputs to the tuner chip.
> 
>  This was more digital tuner--the processor supplied digital numbers to an
> interpreter chip on the tuner board, and that chip conotrls the radio. So I
> figured out how to by pass the interpreter(for lack of a proper name) and
> supply external controls.
> 
> F-S
>
